pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 14, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Niagara-on-the-Lake, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability.

Niagara-on-the Lake Community Centre
14 Anderson Lane

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive by 1:30 p.m.
